name: umeshu sparkling
description: Using Choya Umeshu (also called as 'Honkaku Umeshu' means traditional real umeshu) with any soda you like. Brings unique refreshing feeling to everyone.

ingredients.ingredient: any kind of soda you like

directions: Mix the CHOYA and soda in a highball glass.
Serve over crushed ice and UME fruit.
